attributes.action: Make dogs eat luminous food so that their poo glows in the dark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have u been out late at night and inadvertently stood in a great big mound of dog mess? Surely something could be put into dog food so that their faeces glows in the dark making it easier to "side step" the offending object.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
